ModMetaData.name: No Manhunting Housecats
ModMetaData.description:
Title. Supports vanilla, Vanilla Animals Expanded, and No Gimmicks Just Tortie. For a canine equivalent, see All Dogs Are Good Bois: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2601296065
Illustration by Yayangart via Pixabay.
ModMetaData.author: HeatherAthebyne
